title: How to Make an Edible Fruit Loops Necklace

steps.headline: Measure the elastic around your child's neck.
steps.description: Make sure it is going to be loose and comfortable. Cut the elastic to the length needed.

steps.headline: Have your child sit comfortably at the table following a good hand wash.
steps.description: Put all the fruit loops into a bowl for easy access and show your child how to thread the elastic. Keep your finger on one end to prevent the fruit loops from falling off and to leave enough space for tying the knot.

steps.headline: Have your child continue threading the necklace until it is full of fruit loops.
steps.description: Be sure to leave enough elastic to tie together.

steps.headline: Wear it.
steps.description: Let your child enjoy wearing the necklace. Don't be surprised to see your child nibbling away at it at any time.
